column2: "I discussed the students we've taught so far with my fellow instructors. I'm ashamed to admit they influenced me."
"I'm also acting as an instructor, but I think I want to resume my life as an ARKS."
"So, with that, I'm looking for someone to join up with me when I make my return."
"I wonder, would you be interested? I've judged you to have adequate ability, so I'd leave you to watch my back."
